keyMoments.title: Z's First TV Anime Appearance
keyMoments.description: Z appears for the first time in the TV anime during a flashback, judging the five-hour battle between Shuzo and Ain for the position of his second-in-command.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Z as the leader of the Neo Marines and sets up his role in One Piece Film: Z.
keyMoments.quote: Ain wins. She will be my next in command.

relationships.description: Ain is Z's second-in-command, having won her position by defeating Shuzo.

evolutionMoments.description: Z declares Ain as his second-in-command after her victory over Shuzo.

relationships.description: Shuzo serves under Z in the Neo Marines but lost the position of second-in-command to Ain.

evolutionMoments.description: Z judges Shuzo's battle with Ain and declares Ain the winner.

reveals.information: Leader of the Neo Marines organization
Ain is his second-in-command, chosen over Shuzo

keyMoments.title: Five-Hour Battle with Shuzo
keyMoments.description: In a flashback, Ain fights Shuzo for five hours to determine Z's second-in-command. She wins by using her Modo Modo no Mi powers to turn the ground beneath Shuzo into magma.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Ain's position as Z's second-in-command and demonstrates her Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Modo Modo no Mi Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Ain uses her Modo Modo no Mi powers to revert the ground to magma (twelve years in the past), demonstrating the tactical applications of her Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the Modo Modo no Mi's powers in the TV anime, showing its combat versatility.

abilities.description: Ain shoots an energy ball at a target that returns it to how it was twelve years ago, demonstrated by reverting solid ground back to magma.

relationships.description: Ain serves as Z's second-in-command in the Neo Marines.

evolutionMoments.description: Z declares Ain as his second-in-command after her victory over Shuzo.

relationships.description: Ain defeated Shuzo in a five-hour battle for the position of Z's second-in-command, establishing her superiority in the Neo Marine hierarchy.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals Ain's brutal victory over Shuzo after five hours of combat.

reveals.information: User of the Modo Modo no Mi Devil Fruit
Defeated Shuzo in a five-hour battle to become Z's second-in-command

keyMoments.title: Battle Against Luffy Continues
keyMoments.description: Shuzo continues his fierce battle against Luffy while the Straw Hats attempt to escape with Panz Fry.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Shuzo's determination to capture Panz Fry and his combat prowess against a Yonko-level threat.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Vice Admiral Momonga
keyMoments.description: After the Straw Hats escape, Shuzo turns on Vice Admiral Momonga and his Marine forces, defeating them to prevent any pursuit.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Shuzo's Vice Admiral-level strength and his complete rejection of Marine authority.

keyMoments.title: Flashback: Loss to Ain
keyMoments.description: Shuzo recalls his five-hour battle with Ain for Z's second-in-command position, which he lost when Ain used her Devil Fruit to turn the ground beneath him to magma.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Shuzo's motivation to prove himself and his rivalry with Ain, adding depth to his character.

abilities.description: High-speed movement technique allowing Shuzo to move faster than the eye can follow.
Finger-thrust technique that can pierce through opponents like a bullet.
Body-hardening technique enhanced by Armament Haki, allowing Shuzo to block even Haki-imbued attacks.
Jumping technique that allows movement through the air.
Advanced Haki strong enough to match Luffy's and nullify his Haki-enhanced attacks.

relationships.description: Shuzo serves under Z in the Neo Marines and seeks to prove his worth.
Shuzo lost to Ain in a five-hour battle for Z's second-in-command position and refuses to follow her orders.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals Shuzo's defeat at Ain's hands after five hours of combat.

relationships.description: Alpacacino is Shuzo's weapon and fighting companion.

reveals.information: Fought Ain for five hours to become Z's second-in-command but lost
Vice Admiral-level strength capable of defeating Momonga
Driven by rivalry with Ain and desire to prove himself to Z

keyMoments.title: Rescued via Coup de Burst
keyMoments.description: Panz Fry is successfully evacuated from the battle zone aboard the Thousand Sunny using the Coup de Burst maneuver.
keyMoments.significance: Completes the rescue mission the Straw Hats undertook for Lily.

keyMoments.title: Receives Medical Treatment
keyMoments.description: After landing safely, Chopper treats Panz Fry's injuries from his Marine captivity and the battles.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's compassion and sets up Panz Fry's recovery for future cooking.

bounties.reason: Stealing food from Marines and World Government to feed starving people

abilities.description: Specialized cooking technique using volcanic magma heat to prepare massive dishes.

name.japanese: リリー・エンストマック

keyMoments.title: Escapes with Father
keyMoments.description: Lily successfully escapes with her father Panz Fry aboard the Thousand Sunny via Coup de Burst.
keyMoments.significance: Achieves her goal of rescuing her father from Marine captivity.

keyMoments.title: Thanks Chopper for Helping Father
keyMoments.description: Lily expresses gratitude to Chopper and the crew for rescuing and treating her father.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Lily's appreciation and strengthens her bond with the Straw Hats.

height: Variable (due to Mini Mini no Mi)

abilities.description: Can shrink from five millimeters to giant size while maintaining her natural giant strength.

relationships.description: Lily is Panz Fry's daughter and embarked on a quest to rescue him.
